positions.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
positions.description: We are seeking an experienced Full Stack Developer to join our engineering team. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining scalable web applications using modern technologies. The ideal candidate has strong expertise in both frontend and backend development.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in full-stack development
Strong proficiency in React, Node.js, and TypeScript
Experience with modern frameworks like Next.js, Express
Solid understanding of database design (SQL and NoSQL)
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills
responsibilities: Design and develop scalable web applications
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
Collaborate with cross-functional teams
Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews
Optimize application performance and scalability
Stay updated with latest technology trends

positions.title: DevOps Engineer
positions.description: Join our infrastructure team as a DevOps Engineer to build and maintain our cloud infrastructure. You will work on automating deployment pipelines, monitoring systems, and ensuring high availability of our services.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in DevOps or Site Reliability Engineering
Strong experience with AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform
Proficiency in infrastructure as code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
Experience with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
Knowledge of CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions)
Strong scripting skills (Bash, Python, or Go)
Experience with monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK)
responsibilities: Design and implement CI/CD pipelines
Manage cloud infrastructure and ensure high availability
Automate deployment and scaling processes
Monitor system performance and troubleshoot issues
Implement security best practices
Collaborate with development teams on infrastructure needs

positions.title: UI/UX Designer
positions.description: We are looking for a creative UI/UX Designer to craft beautiful and intuitive user experiences. You will work closely with product managers and developers to design user interfaces that delight our customers.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in UI/UX design
Strong portfolio demonstrating design expertise
Proficiency in Figma, Adobe XD, or Sketch
Understanding of user-centered design principles
Experience with responsive and mobile-first design
Knowledge of design systems and component libraries
Strong communication and collaboration skills
responsibilities: Design user interfaces for web and mobile applications
Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups
Conduct user research and usability testing
Collaborate with developers to implement designs
Maintain and evolve design systems
Stay updated with design trends and best practices

positions.title: Business Development Manager
positions.description: We are seeking a dynamic Business Development Manager to drive growth and expand our client base. You will identify new business opportunities, build relationships with potential clients, and contribute to our revenue goals.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in B2B sales or business development
Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets
Strong understanding of IT services and solutions
Excellent communication and presentation skills
Experience with CRM tools (Salesforce, HubSpot)
Strong networking and relationship-building abilities
Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or related field
responsibilities: Identify and pursue new business opportunities
Build and maintain relationships with key clients
Develop proposals and presentations for potential clients
Negotiate contracts and close deals
Collaborate with technical teams on solution design
Track and report on sales metrics and pipeline

positions.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
positions.description: Join our marketing team as a Digital Marketing Specialist to drive online visibility and lead generation. You will manage digital campaigns across multiple channels and optimize our online presence.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in digital marketing
Strong knowledge of SEO, SEM, and content marketing
Experience with Google Ads, Facebook Ads, LinkedIn Ads
Proficiency in Google Analytics and marketing automation tools
Strong copywriting and content creation skills
Data-driven mindset with analytical skills
Experience with email marketing and lead nurturing
responsibilities: Plan and execute digital marketing campaigns
Optimize website content for search engines
Manage paid advertising campaigns across platforms
Create engaging content for social media and blogs
Analyze campaign performance and provide insights
Generate and nurture leads through digital channels

positions.title: Project Manager
positions.description: We need an experienced Project Manager to lead software development projects from inception to delivery. You will coordinate with cross-functional teams, manage timelines, and ensure successful project outcomes.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in IT project management
PMP or Scrum Master certification preferred
Strong understanding of Agile/Scrum methodologies
Experience managing software development projects
Excellent leadership and team management skills
Strong risk management and problem-solving abilities
Proficiency in project management tools (Jira, Asana, MS Project)
responsibilities: Plan and manage project scope, timeline, and budget
Lead project teams and facilitate communication
Monitor project progress and identify risks
Coordinate with stakeholders and manage expectations
Ensure project deliverables meet quality standards
Document project processes and lessons learned
